root: ^I'm a journalist, do you mind if I ask you a few questions about the carnival?
^What's your favorite game at the carnival?
^Have you seen any of the shows?
^OH MY GOSH I LOVE THE ROLLER COASTER THEY GO UP AND DOWN AND UP AND DOWN...
^THIS ONE HAS SO MANY TURNS AND GOES SO SO SO FAST AND YOU FEEL LIKE YOU'RE FALLING IT'S SO FUN...
^AND WHEN YOU GO UP THE LIFT IT'S SO LOUD BUT YOU GET A HUGE VIEW OF THE CARNIVAL AND THEN YOU GO UP AND DOWN AND UP...
^I COULD RIDE ALL DAY IT'S SO FUN-
^Yeah! There's lots of fun things to do... like the horseshow throwing over by the games!
